SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface PatientApptInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
PatientApptUI
public interface PatientApptInterface
This interface defines methods related to managing a patient's appointments. It includes functionality for viewing available appointment slots, scheduling or rescheduling appointments, canceling appointments, and viewing past appointment outcomes.

The methods in this interface are intended to be implemented by classes that provide functionality for a patient to interact with their appointment details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cancelAppointment(Scanner sc, Patient patient)
    Allows the patient to cancel a scheduled appointment.
    void
    rescheduleAppointment(Scanner sc, Patient patient)
    Allows the patient to reschedule a previously scheduled appointment.
    void
    scheduleAppointment(Scanner sc, Patient patient)
    Allows the patient to schedule an appointment.
    void
    viewAvailableApptSlots(Scanner sc)
    Displays the available appointment slots for the patient to choose from.
    void
    viewPastApptOutcomes(Patient patient)
    Displays the outcomes of past appointments for the patient.
    void
    viewScheduledAppointments(Patient patient)
    Displays the appointments that have already been scheduled for the patient.

  • Method Details

    • viewAvailableApptSlots

      void viewAvailableApptSlots(Scanner sc)
      Displays the available appointment slots for the patient to choose from.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.

    • scheduleAppointment

      void scheduleAppointment(Scanner sc, Patient patient)
      Allows the patient to schedule an appointment.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      patient - The Patient scheduling the appointment.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      void rescheduleAppointment(Scanner sc, Patient patient)
      Allows the patient to reschedule a previously scheduled appointment.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      patient - The Patient rescheduling the appointment.

      void cancelAppointment(Scanner sc, Patient patient)
      Allows the patient to cancel a scheduled appointment.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      patient - The Patient canceling the appointment.

    • viewScheduledAppointments

      void viewScheduledAppointments(Patient patient)
      Displays the appointments that have already been scheduled for the patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose scheduled appointments are to be viewed.

    • viewPastApptOutcomes

      void viewPastApptOutcomes(Patient patient)
      Displays the outcomes of past appointments for the patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient whose past appointment outcomes are to be viewed.
